content.rendered:
This fall we are quite busy at Bluefilters Professional. Besides our regular work, we will be attending two industry exhibitions:

HOGA, 17 – 19 October, Nuremberg, Germany
The most significant exhibition for the German hospitality business. If you want to know what’s new in water filtering technologies for the HoReCa industry, come and see us at our stand C30, hall 3A.

Aquatech, 2 – 5 November, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
A place to be for water professionals from all over the world, especially for process, drinking and wastewater. We will be presenting potable water filters for commercial use at our stand 01.488.

You are welcome to stop by and have a business chat with us over a cup of aromatic espresso.

See you there!
